first_para: Steven Philip Rotheram (born 4 November 1961) is a British Labour Party politician who has been the Member of Parliament for Liverpool Walton since 2010. He also served as the Lord Mayor of Liverpool from 2008 to 2009 and a Councillor for Fazakerley from 2002 to 2011.

full.extract: Steven Philip Rotheram (born 4 November 1961) is a British Labour Party politician who has been the Member of Parliament for Liverpool Walton since 2010. He also served as the Lord Mayor of Liverpool from 2008 to 2009 and a Councillor for Fazakerley from 2002 to 2011.
full.title: Steve Rotheram
